game.name: Bluegrass: Mindfulness Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy ASMR-narrative rhythm life-sim. Laid off, Linda is seeking peace on the Appalachian Trail. Guide her pulse as she unveils her Granny’s old hand-drawn illustrations and makes new memories in this relaxing spatial audio journey to Mt. Katahdin.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy ASMR-narrative rhythm life-sim. Laid off, Linda is seeking peace on the Appalachian Trail. Guide her pulse as she unveils her Granny’s old hand-drawn illustrations and makes new memories in this relaxing spatial audio journey to Mt. Katahdin.
